english.segment1: Free and unconditional. Your love. I'm speechless. Lasting, unerasable. Jealous, unexplainable. Your love. I need it
english.segment2: I want You. I want You. I want You. Alone. I want You. I want You. I want You. Alone
english.segment3: The day You made the sacrifice. You dressed me in the purest white. Your bride is grateful. Desperate now for You to come. Establish Your Kingdom. Until then. I'll be faithful
english.segment4: I want You. I want You. I want You. Alone. I want You. I want You. I want You. Alone
english.segment5: Your presence is thick. Filling this place. I close my eyes and I imagine Your face. With my head on Your chest. I savor Your embrace. You pull me so close. And then I hear You say
english.segment6: I want you. I want you. I want you. Alone. I want you. I want you. I want you. Alone
